name: Inside, Outside, The Room.
description:
"Inside, Outside, The Room" is a story between you, your mom, David, and Yami.

You wake up in dark and lost all your memories. You saw your mom and your friend. In these 7 days, you found something, something that is the truth.

It contains lots of repeat choices.

* It's unfinished. Only Ending I - IV is added.
* It May contain lots of bugs and grammar mistakes.
* Game Instruction (if need) will added when all ending is added.
